categories: Category:Star Wars: Forces of Destiny: Daring Adventures

nodes.text: Forces of Destiny: Daring Adventures: Volumes 1 & 2

Forces of Destiny: Daring Adventures: Volumes 1 & 2 is the unabridged audio version of the canon young-reader books Forces of Destiny: Daring Adventures: Volume 1 and Forces of Destiny: Daring Adventures: Volume 2, written by Emma Carlson Berne. The audiobook was performed by January LaVoy and was released by Blackstone Publishing on December 15, 2017.
